violations.description: More than 1000 people in a single zone at any time.
violations.recommendation: Reduce the number of people or adjust zones.

violations.description: Persons are nearby without proper badges.
violations.recommendation: Ensure all persons have the correct badges.

violations.description: Attended bags, weapons, or unknown packages.

violations.recommendation: Stop any fighting and ensure no one is being aggressive.

violations.description: All persons in work zones must wear required PPE.
violations.recommendation: Check all persons have hard hats and vests.

report.summary: The observation is non-compliant with several rules. Please check for any additional violations or ensure the correct badges are in use.
